content:
Is there an up to date wasmtime binding for the JVM that includes support for the component model floating around out there? Is this the most up to date binding available kawamuray/wasmtime-java: Java or JVM-language binding for Wasmtime (github.com)?

GitHub - kawamuray/wasmtime-java: Java or JVM-language binding for Wasmtime
Java or JVM-language binding for Wasmtime. Contribute to kawamuray/wasmtime-java development by creating an account on GitHub.
